networkAccess.reasoning: UText connects to various LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Mistral, Groq, Cohere, Yandex Cloud) via a configurable proxy, and also supports local LM Studio servers at user-defined addresses (e.g. http://192.168.x.x:1234). Wildcard is required because local server IPs are user-defined and cannot be enumerated in advance.
